name: Correct the error in the code. Method continue
instruction:
The `onlyNegative` function takes an array of numbers.

The function should return an array with negative numbers only.

Correct the error in the code so that the function works correctly.

Use the `continue` method to skip loop iteration.

The solution will be tested on the application of the `continue` method.

An example of running a function:
```javascript
onlyNegative([1, 2, 3, -1, -2, -3]); // [-1, -2, -3];
onlyNegative([1, 2, 3]); // [];
```
